title: 3,500 MT of Gas to reach Sri Lanka
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro noted that another vessel carrying 3500MT of gas will reach the country on Monday (16).
The Chairman of Litro said that US $7 Million will be paid for the shipment on Tuesday (17).
He further said that the distribution of the gas will start on Wednesday (18) after unloading commences tomorrow (17).
